edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final

Class Ninja

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final.Ninja
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Ninja
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Ninja, who is the main enemy of the game. Is created and put on a random cell on the board that's not a room. It kills the player if he's on a space next to them. It can die if the player shoots them.
    Author:
    Corey Perez, Eduardo Saenz, Lance Dall, Grant Posner, Bumjoong Kim, Jacob Chong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ninja()
      Constructor for the Ninja() class Ninjas start off with a random row, column, and are alive
